about_the_game:
Dive into the depths of "Deep Down," a thrilling Action RPG where you play as a brave miner exploring procedurally generated caves filled with valuable ores and hidden dangers. In this immersive adventure, each day presents new challenges and opportunities as you gather resources, upgrade your tools, and uncover the secrets buried deep beneath the earth.

Explore Procedurally Generated Mines: Each level of the mine is unique, with an increasing abundance of valuable ores and formidable hazards the deeper you go.
Engage in Real-Time Actions: Perform mining, crafting, and combat in real-time. Use your tools to extract resources, fend off threats, and survive the collapsing mine.
Resource Management: Collect and manage various ores such as Aluminum, Gold, Iron, and more. Smelt these ores into ingots in the Blacksmith’s Forge and combine them to create powerful alloys.
Craft and Upgrade Tools: Start with basic wooden tools and upgrade to stronger materials like steel and titanium. Customize and enhance your equipment to improve efficiency and survivability.
Day/Night Cycle: Plan your mining expeditions carefully. Each day you have limited time to explore the mines before needing to rest and prepare for the next adventure.

Procedurally generated mines with increasing difficulty and rewards.
Real-time mining, crafting, and combat mechanics.
A variety of ores and resources to collect and utilize.
Tool and equipment crafting with multiple upgrade paths.
Essential buildings with maintenance and upgrading options.
A robust day/night cycle influencing gameplay and strategy.

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 7600 GT or AMD Radeon X1650
